content:
I'd be happy to help you plan your week and set reminders for your tasks and events.

Let's start by creating a virtual calendar for you. I'll make sure to block out your yoga class every Tuesday from 8:30 PM to 9:30 PM.

What are the tasks and events you need to schedule for the week? Please share them with me, and I'll help you organize them and set reminders. You can share the following details for each task/event:

* Task/Event name
* Date
* Time (if applicable)
* Duration (if applicable)
* Any additional notes or reminders you'd like to add

Go ahead and share your tasks and events, and I'll help you get everything organized!
